page.title: 20GENERAL ROUNDUP
page.content: A number of the subjects we covered have linked together to give a number of worries for the future. The main worry is the falling water table of the River Worfe.This has already caused a loss of fishing especially Trout in the upper reaches of the river and is spreading as the lack of oxygen in the lower water levels causes a decreasein plant and animal life.The lower levels are also causing problems for farmers who are finding their own private borehols drying upand the land requiring greater irrigation in the Summer.This is leading to small but significant changes in farming patterns as some crops now become unprofitable with the increased water costs.There is now also the increased risk of polluted material being drawn into the dry Red Sandstone and polluting all supplies
